posts.post_content:
I am trying to sell these cards as soon as possible...so I have put some on ebay and am again lowering the prices of the others.  Some on ebay don't have bids yet, so I believe I can still remove them from ebay if anyone is interested.  For the other cards, I am trying to lower the prices again before putting them on ebay as well.  New prices are listed in PURPLE

If you are interested in any, please e-mail me at [url]RachB4980@aol.com[/url]. I will cover all shipping costs as well!!  Thank you again for your interest and consideration!!!  If you are getting more than one card, I can probably go down slightly on price as well!  I am still willing to consider ALL offers too!!!!!!  Thanks again  :)
